org.factcenter.qilin.protocols

Interface TrapdoorCommitmentPoK

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommitmentPoK

    public interface TrapdoorCommitmentPoK
extends CommitmentPoK
    This is a version of a commitment Proof-of-Knowledge in which there exists a trapdoor for the prover. Using the secret trapdoor key, the prover can generate `fake' proofs that will nevertheless be accepted by the verifier.
    See Also:
    CommitmentPoK

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TrapdoorCommitmentPoK.TrapdoorProver<C,P,R>
      Represents a prover holding the secret trapdoor key for the proof-of-knowledge.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.factcenter.qilin.protocols.CommitmentPoK

        CommitmentPoK.Prover<C,P,R>, CommitmentPoK.Verifier<C,P,R>
